Data.name: Building an empire on the back of a father’s wealth
Data.descript: “The beauty of me is that I’m very rich.”

Data.name: Given a Purple Heart at a rally
Data.descript: “I always wanted to get a Purple Heart. This was much easier.”

Data.name: Stroking xenophobia for political gains
Data.descript: “I will build a great wall - and nobody builds better walls than me, believe me.”

Data.name: Creating a business with the end game of making money
Data.descript: “I work very, very hard. I’ve created thousands and thousands of jobs. Tens of thousands of jobs.”

Data.name: Risking the racist vote by backing away from a full ban against Muslims by name
Data.descript: “We must suspend immigration from regions linked with terrorism until a proven vetting method is in place.”

Data.name: Seeking a deferment from the Vietnam War draft, five times
Data.descript: Bravely using privilege to escape a dreadful war that cost over 50,000 American lives, but hey, you helped build a Vietnam War Memorial in New York.

Data.name: Throwing conservative values out the window to embrace a demagogue
Data.descript: GOP leadership embracing Trump as their flagbearer and choosing to clean up his messes rather than disavow him in name of winning the White House.

Data.name: Saving a people from a burning building
Data.descript: Like Jared Marshallick, a 13-year-old Boy Scout who, with his father, saved a family from a burning building in Nanticoke, PA.

Data.name: Awarded a Purple Heart through military service
Data.descript: You know, risking your life and limb for country and getting injured in process. About 2 million awarded.

Data.name: Leaving family behind to seek better opportunities
Data.descript: Leaving a familiar culture, saying goodbye to family and risking imprisonment to immigrate to the US in order to provide for loved ones back home.

Data.name: Working multiple jobs to make ends meet
Data.descript: The millions of Americans who work multiple part-time jobs, often at low wages, just to keep food on the table and a roof over their heads.

Data.name: Fleeing war-torn Syria for unfriendly lands
Data.descript: Close to 5 million Syrians have fled Syria and braved xenophobia, smugglers and an unforgiving Mediterranean Sea to escape the hellish civil war there.

Data.name: Protesting a Donald Trump rally
Data.descript: Dealing with slurs, sexual harassment,  pepper spray, and calls for violence against you, the protester, by The Donald himself.

Data.name: Volunteering to serve in the Armed Forces
Data.descript: One of the 1.3 million Americans who voluntarily decided to risk their lives serving their country.
